like that
you can totally overcrowd it and because

Brown them and not start boiling if you

just you know 30 seconds then in goes

white long grain rice nothing exotic

you blame me
all right regular white rice give that a

you're going to dump in your stock I'm
using just ready-made chicken stock you

bring that to a simmer cover and bake

then you get that perfect chicken
